CONGENITAL DISORDERS 
Screening for congenital disorders 
• Routine screening for structural and chromosomal congenital disorders is not yet practical in the public sector
in South Africa.
• Targeted screening can be offered where available, and certain pregnant women (see below) may need referral
to a specialist health facility or a maternal fetal ultrasound unit, depending on the availability of these services.
